column2: Excellent school of art and design-also has great summer programs
column3: A focused school of art and design which excels in animation, illustration, fashion design, game design, toy design, and more. The school has approximately 1200 students and interacts heavily with the LA creative arts and business community.The school also runs an excellent summer of art program for students not yet in college.Many professors are professional animators, illustrators, artists, and storytellers. They bring an authenticity to the classroom and students respond accordingly.

I was here to meet a peer in my field of work and while on the campus, I had the opportunity to appreciate the surrounding, it's buildings, services, dorms and artworks of some of their students on display. On the displayed artwork, I can only say they are excellent and the campus should be proud of such high standards and work pieces produced by the students. The environment and school are also nice and there is a sense of calm and serenity everywhere. Staff / Employee culture is great and the work climate is infectious. Whether as a student or employee, I would love to be part of this school if the stars are aligned.

column2: Excellent range of art: visual, textile, animation, fashion
column3: The Otis College of Art and Design is a gem in LA. Great educational opportunities, great teachers, and great exhibits of student art. The talents that are in display are both humbling and mesmerizing! It's very exciting to see such creativity nourished and developed to share.

column2: You Drive By OTIS en route to LAX ...
column3: Otis College is right on Lincoln and you drive past it as you're hurrying to LAX for a flight - so stop in on the way back. Nicely laid out campus with modern Architecture buildings. We enjoyed touring. Also visited their Art Gallery with pieces by current and former students. Nice. We also go to Otis art events and openings. Enjoy this LA design treasure. ...

column2: Great programs for young artists and aspiring professionals!
column3: If you're looking for a professional art education you probably already know about this place. If not, put it on your list. Otis has a great program and associations with the local industries such as Mattel and Electronic Arts. It's not cheap, but you get what you pay for!
